app_descript:
JustFit - Lazy Workout

Brief:

JustFit emerges as your ultimate virtual fitness coach, providing an innovative and engaging way to lose weight and gain muscle from the comfort of your home. With no equipment necessary, JustFit guides you through a variety of health and fitness training regimens, including an exciting 28-day beginner wall pilates challenge. Tailored to both beginners and advanced users alike, JustFit tracks your progress and offers personalized workout plans to ensure you meet your fitness goals effectively.
